CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 28, 1953, pg. 17 reads: "Happy Birthday To You!...Mrs. David L. Lawrence, wife of the Mayor of Pittsburgh, smiles prettily as she pins double orchids on the shoulder of honoree, Mrs. Robert L. Vann, while Mrs. Alma Illery, instigator of the party, beams. This scene took place just before Mrs. Vann entered the ballroom of the Hotel Sheraton where nearly seven hundred guests awaited her presence." - (Sockwell Photo)
TitMainTitle: Jessie Vann, Alma Illery, and Mrs. David L. Lawrence, pinning corsages on each other, in Penn Sheraton hotel for Jessie Vann's birthday party
